root.name: Midway Arcade
root.description: Midway titles include:Spy HunterRampageJoustRoot Beer TapperDefenderArch RivalsThe collection also includes generic "arcade" favorites such asAir HockeyArcade BasketballPoolRoll BallAdditional in-app purchases can add:"Fantasy Game Pack"GauntletGauntlet IIWizard of Wor"Action Game Pack"NARCTotal CarnageAPB
